mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.name as name ,a.phone as phone ,a.id_number as idNumber ,a.birthday_time as birthdayTime ,a.bumen_types as bumenTypes ,a.zhiwei_types as zhiweiTypes ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.my_photo as myPhoto ,a.nation as nation ,a.politics_types as politicsTypes ,a.birthplace as birthplace ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM yonghu a
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.name like CONCAT('%',#{params.name},'%')
and a.phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.phone},'%')
and a.id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.idNumber},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.birthday_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.birthdayTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.birthday_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.birthdayTimeEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and a.bumen_types = #{params.bumenTypes}
and a.zhiwei_types = #{params.zhiweiTypes}
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.nation like CONCAT('%',#{params.nation},'%')
and a.politics_types = #{params.politicsTypes}
and a.birthplace like CONCAT('%',#{params.birthplace},'%')
order by a.id desc
